title: Lesson 28
paragraph: Tempo and repair influence productivity. Performing tasks with purpose, restoring equipment, and maintaining structural integrity ensures continuous progress.

words.meaning: speed or pace of an activity
words.example: The orchestra maintained a steady tempo.

words.meaning: to return to a former condition

words.example: She took purposeful steps toward her goal.

words.japaneseMeaning: 報告された、説明された
words.example: The team was briefed before the mission.

words.meaning: relating to the construction of something
words.example: Structural improvements were made to the bridge.
The instructions were simple to follow.

words.meaning: to carry out or execute an action
words.example: The surgeon performed the operation successfully.
The castle had a grand portal.
